PrecisRegulations Amending the SMALL BUSINESS LOANS REGULATIONS, 1993 by making provision for an extension in the time period during which commercial money lenders may make loans for the purposes of the establishment, expansion, modernization and improvement of small and medium-sized businesses, effective March 31, 1998.
